website_summaries.verdict: A good cycling shoe for anyone who wants to upgrade their cycling gear to a semi-professional level.
pros: Contoured interior makes the shoe comfortable to wear for long periods of time
Ratchet strap secures the shoe to the foot
cons: Fastener attachment isn't as convenient as more modern BOA fasteners

customer_reviews.title: First attempt at road shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Have used Giro 2-screw cleats (mountain bike) style for a couple of years, for the convenience. But up-graded to the 3 screw road style and it's working out perfectly. Shoe fits like my older (45 = size 10.5 US) Giro. Great cleat!
customer_reviews.author: Troy D

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order was a half size larger but was a worse fit than the 1st pair "smaller in size"
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why these shoes are so tight in the toe area, I have bought 2 similar styles, same brand same size and they fit well with a little room for those winter socks you would need later in the winter months, 2nd time now I have had to send these type back, 2nd order was a half size larger but was a worse fit than the 1st pair "smaller in size"???? will return and not bother ordering another pair due to this... if you do buy these buy a size above, really nice road shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: sunman

customer_reviews.title: Great value but do run at least a half size small.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7.5 to 8ish in various shoes usually an 8. I ordered the size 8 and they teetering on snug. So I agree with the others who say this shoe runs small. Order at least half size larger if not a full size. I probably would've been fine with the next size up but I am only using for Peleton.
customer_reviews.author: BobZ

customer_reviews.title: Great support, breathable, and good looks!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple design with a good color combination . Bindings are great. Easy to adjust. Partially meshed uppers provide good ventilation. Overall, a good shoe for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Felix

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, sharp look and great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great price fora nice shoe that works just right. You must order 1/2 or a full size up because they run tight otherwise
customer_reviews.author: damian fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, soft inside, quality materials
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, comfy and fit true to size. I have not had a single problem with them and am on my 2nd month of using them almost every day. They are also very sharp looking!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Flint

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Like the style and comfort of this road cycling shoe. I found it true to size following the guide- I wear a 10.5 and ordered a EU 45.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Herington

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: One was to big the other to small. Great shoe quality and great customer services
customer_reviews.author: Miguel R.

customer_reviews.title: Made several sizes small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are cut way small. I had to return, buy larger size, and return again because they were still too small
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received this within a short period as advertised. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Burki

customer_reviews.title: shiny red shoes to match my dialed red allez elite
customer_reviews.text: Great cycling shoes- just as specified. Note- you have to buy the cleats, they do not come with the shoes (and I didn't realize that until after I purchased)
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Sterlis

product_meta.title: Giro Apeckx II Shoes - Men's
product_meta.description: The Apeckx II combines a supple bonded and welded mesh upper with an impressively stiff DuPont Zytel sole. The welded and bonded upper results in fewer seams for reduced hot spots and improved comfort. Fit is adjustable via the classic combination of a micro-ratcheting, low-profile N-1 buckle and two straps. A supportive, anti-microbial EVA footbed optimizes comfort while reducing odour. Plus, the Apeckx II is built on the same last as our highest performance shoes, so you get the same amazing fit that has made Giro the fastest-growing brand of cycling shoes.
feature_bullets: Innovation is more than bells and whistles
